biography_text: FRANKS, Trent, a Representative from Arizona; born in Uravan, Montrose County, Colo., June 19, 1957; attended Ottawa University, Ottawa, Kans.; business owner; member of the Arizona state house of representatives, 1985-1987; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighth and to the seven succeeding Congresses until his resignation on December 8, 2017 (January 3, 2003-December 8, 2017).
